{{champion:82}} ...
{{summoner:31}} ...
{{champion:82}} ...is this going to be a thing now?
{{summoner:31}} Well imagine Sona wearing your armor.
{{champion:82}} She's so small compared to me she can curl up inside of my chest piece, let alone my whole armor.
{{summoner:31}} You worded that without a hypothetical.
{{champion:82}} (realizes what he said, looks away, blushing under his faceplate)
{{summoner:31}} (grins) You dog, you!
I think this might be in the wrong post but we may never know.
Beware, these post could really have dire consequences...

They were warned, but for naught, they shall not listen...
